title: Task
description: Initia members are tasked with developing a new website for ROSS Leaders to better tell their inspiring story with clear and concise phrases that convey the correct emotions.

title: Submission
description: You will be submitting illustrations of various important pages on the website, as well as defining each element on that page and how they answer the rubricâ€™s specifications.

title: Awards
description: The competitor with the best design would then have the opportunity to work with ROSS Leaders and obtain an internship in making and maintaining their website

title: Team
description: Submissions are to be done as a team. Each team will consist of 2-6 members

title: Judges
description: ROSS Leaders will be judging the website on its minimalism, crisp design, and the accuracy of the story needed to be portrayed. The primary draft of the website will be an illustration with descriptions and videos that would need to be provided to the ROSS Leaders foundation for judging.
